column4: I have remote desktop installed... I can control computer X with Y, but I only get the very first screen and from there the screen does not update...anyone?
I can reverse this so that I can control Y with X but same thing, no screen updating
anyone else run into this and know how to fix?
ct?
what is that?
I can't say i've had that issue, screen not refreshing.
same subnet?
same router, side by side
have you tried a different client?
suggestions?
on 9.10 I use remote desktop viewer, works great.
that is what I am using, having the problem
hmm..
I am using remote desktop server on both ends
it connects fine, I can move the mouse on either machine from the other, just no screen refresh
joihdi, I'm wondering if you have view only mode on...
jiohdi*
it is checked for allow others to view and allow others to control
there are not that many settings on the client
or server
when you connect, you should get an option to view only. be sure it's not checked.
view only would be the opposite condition... refresh but no control
